mapper.sql: branch_id, enterprise_id, name, address, latitude, longitude, telephone
mapper.insert: insert into branch(enterprise_id, name, address, latitude, longitude, telephone) values(#{enterpriseId}, #{name}, #{address}, #{latitude}, #{longitude}, #{telephone})
mapper.select: select br.branch_id, br.name, br.address, br.latitude, br.longitude, br.telephone, lec.lecturer_id 'lecturers.lecturer_id', lec.name 'lecturers.name', lec.photo_url 'lecturers.photo_url', lec.introduction 'lecturers.introduction' from branch br join lecturer lec on br.branch_id = lec.branch_id where branch_id=#{branchId}
mapper.update: update branch set name=#{name}, address=#{address}, latitude=#{latitude}, longitude=#{longitude}, telephone=#{telephone}
